productEmsList.title: inReach® Satellite Communication
productEmsList.tooltip: Satellite communicator enables two-way text messaging via 100% global Iridium® satellite network (satellite subscription required)

productEmsList.title: Charts and Maps
productEmsList.tooltip:
Worldwide basemap: Non-detailed map for general reference.
BlueChart® g3: Detailed charts for U.S. coastal waters.

PRODUCT_PAGE_SUPPLEMENTARY_DISCLAIMERS.PRODUCT_PAGE_AWESOME_DISCLAIMER: Engineering enhancements are ongoing and may not be reflected in the pictures, videos and specifications.

seoAttributes.description: GPSMAP 86i is a handle marine GPS with inReach satellite communication, two text messaging, and the ability to stream boat data from compatible instruments.
seoAttributes.seoKeywords: GPSMap, GPS Map, 86i, handheld gps, marine gps
seoAttributes.title: GPSMAP® 86i

010-02235-01.productVariation: Marine Handheld Preloaded With Worldwide Basemap

seo.ogDescription: GPSMAP 86s is a handheld marine GPS with a preloaded Worldwide Basemap and the ability to stream boat data from compatible instruments.
seo.title: Garmin GPSMAP® 86s | Handheld Marine GPS

specs.Battery life: up to 35 hours at 10-minute tracking; up to 200 hours at 30-minute tracking (power save mode)
specs.External memory storage: yes (32 GB max microSD™ card, not included)
specs.Interface: high speed microUSB and NMEA 0183 compatible
specs.Memory/History: 16 GB (user space varies based on included mapping)
specs.Navigation Routes: 250, 250 points per route; 50 points auto routing
specs.Navigation Track Log: 20,000 points, 250 saved gpx tracks, 300 saved fit activities
